panels.title: Daily Cluster Cost per Instance and Capacity Type
Daily Cluster Cost per Instance Type and Capacity Type

panels.description:
label_replace is used to ALWAYS have a different label (resource) when doing OR, so that no time series is filtered by binary operations (capacity_type for internal OR, resource for external OR)

If for example a pod has CPU requests but not memory requests, the binary sum (+) will filter the CPU sum (won't count for them)

targets.expr:
sum_over_time(
    sum by (namespace) (
        # See description for label_replace
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_requests_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_requests_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_requests_cost
        , "resource", "CPU", "","")
        
        OR 
        
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_requests_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_requests_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_requests_cost
        , "resource", "memory", "","")

	)
[1d:1h])

panels.title: Daily Resources Requests Cost per Namespace

targets.expr:
sum_over_time(
    sum by (namespace) (
        # See description for label_replace
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:spot_pod_cpu_usage_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_cpu_usage_instance_cpu_price:on_demand_pod_cpu_usage_cost
        , "resource", "CPU", "","")
        
        OR 
        
        label_replace(
		    zone_capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:spot_pod_mem_usage_cost
            OR
            capacity_instance_namespace_node_pod:pod_memory_usage_instance_mem_price:on_demand_pod_mem_usage_cost
        , "resource", "memory", "","")

	)
[1d:1h])

panels.title: Daily Resources Requests Memory Cost per Namespace
Daily Memory Usage Cost per Namespace
Daily Resources Requests CPU Cost per Namespace
Daily CPU Usage Cost per Namespace

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (
  sum by (node) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace="$namespace"}) 
  * on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
  sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"}) 
)

sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (
	sum by (node) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", name!=""})
	* on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
	sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"})
)

Daily Memory Usage Cost Per Instance and Capacity Type
Daily CPU Requested Cost Per Instance and Capacity Type
Daily Memory Requested Cost Per Instance and Capacity Type

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, pod) (
    sum by (pod, node) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace=~"$namespace"})
    * on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
    sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"})
)

sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, pod) (
  sum by (pod, node) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", name!=""})
  * on (node) group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type) 
  sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_capacity_type, label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type, node) (kube_node_labels{job="kube-state-metrics"})
)
